programme.title: On This Day
programme.desc: Grant Hill has 21 points, 11 rebounds and 10 assists and Allan Houston adds 25 points as Detroit overcomes the Magic and Shaquille O'Neal's 31 points and 18 rebounds. From April 7, 1995.
